sentences.en: A good general diet should include plenty of fresh vegetables.
sentences.cn: 良好的日常饮食应该包含大量的新鲜蔬菜。

sentences.en: a land of plenty
sentences.cn: 一片富饶的土地

sentences.en: Are there plenty of fresh fruits and vegetables in your diet?
sentences.cn: 你的饮食中新鲜果蔬充足吗？

sentences.en: He's got plenty of brains as well as brawn.
sentences.cn: 他头脑聪明，身体强健。

sentences.en: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato.
sentences.cn: 我鼓励演奏双簧管和单簧管的乐手们多使用颤音。

sentences.en: I was plenty nervous.
sentences.cn: 我很紧张。

sentences.en: I’d practiced plenty.
sentences.cn: 我已经练得够多了。

sentences.en: Seen from a netsurfer's screen, there are plenty of stores to "visit".
sentences.cn: 从网上冲浪者的显示器上可以看到很多可“光顾”的商店。

sentences.en: She is in the fortunate position of having plenty of choice.
sentences.cn: 好在她有很多选择。

sentences.en: She needs plenty of room for experiment in her life.
sentences.cn: 她一生需要很多尝试的机会。

sentences.en: The compartment is plenty big enough.
sentences.cn: 这个隔间足够大了。

sentences.en: The nursery is bright and cheerful, with plenty of toys.
sentences.cn: 托儿所明亮宜人，还有许多玩具。

sentences.en: The private sector, by contrast, has plenty of money to spend.
sentences.cn: 相比之下，私营部门就有很多钱可供开销。

sentences.en: The water is clear and plenty of fish are visible.
sentences.cn: 水清澈见底，能看见许多鱼。

sentences.en: The water looked plenty deep.
sentences.cn: 这水看起来很深。

sentences.en: There are free buses around the resort and plenty of nightlife.
sentences.cn: 这个游览胜地到处都有免费大巴，夜生活也很丰富。

sentences.en: There are plenty of plus points about being an older first-time mum.
sentences.cn: 年龄稍长再做妈妈有很多好处。

sentences.en: There were plenty of servants to wait on her.
sentences.cn: 有很多仆人服侍她。

sentences.en: There’s plenty to do and see in New York.
sentences.cn: 在纽约有很多事可做，很多东西可看。

sentences.en: You have plenty of time to read.
sentences.cn: 你有大量的时间读书。

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something is more than big enough, fast enough etc
a situation in which there is a lot of food and goods available for people
a large quantity that is enough or more than enough
